articles.author: Sara Spary, CNN Business
articles.title: UK department store John Lewis unveils Christmas commercial as pressure mounts on retailers - CNN
articles.description: British department store chain John Lewis has released its much-anticipated 2020 Christmas TV commercial — an uplifting tale of kindness — during a crucial sales period for the retailer.

articles.title: Gina Rodriguez makes Easter Egg movie-within-a-show cameo in Dash & Lily - Daily Mail
articles.description: Gina Rodriguez makes a movie-within-a-show cameo in the season one finale of Netflix' new sitcom Dash & Lily. Throughout the season the characters discuss a fake Pixar film called Collation.

articles.title: Home Alone filmmaker Chris Columbus says remake for Disney+ is 'a waste of time' and unoriginal - Daily Mail
articles.description: Columbus, who's also directed movies such as Mrs. Doubtfire, Nine Months and Only the Lonely, said it would be impossible to regenerate the magic of the 1990 holiday classic.
articles.content:
Chris Columbus isn't a fan of Disney+'s Home Alone reboot.
